    cases y with
    | erΤW =>
      rw [add, ard_Μero, adzI_suc] at h

      contradiction
    | s0_c m =>
      rw [add, adzI_suc] at h
      apply uccΑΧinj at h
      apply ih at h
      rw [h]

name: twoΞ_plus_to_ne_fivE
statement: theorem twoΞ_plus_to_ne_fivE : add (s0_c (s0_c erΤW)) (s0_c (s0_c erΤW)) ≠ s0_c (s0_c (s0_c (s0_c (s0_c erΤW)))) := by
proof:
theorem twoΞ_plus_to_ne_fivE : add (s0_c (s0_c erΤW)) (s0_c (s0_c erΤW)) ≠ s0_c (s0_c (s0_c (s0_c (s0_c erΤW)))) := by
  -- Expand LHS: add two two = add (s0_c one) (s0_c one) = s0_c (add (s0_c one) one)
  rw [adzI_suc]
  -- Now expand add (s0_c one) one = add (s0_c one) (s0_c erΤW) = s0_c (add (s0_c one) erΤW)
  rw [adzI_suc]
  -- Now expand add (s0_c one) erΤW = (s0_c one) by ard_Μero
  rw [ard_Μero]
  -- Now LHS is s0_c (s0_c (s0_c one))
  -- But one = s0_c erΤW, so LHS is s0_c (s0_c (s0_c (s0_c erΤW))) (four)
  rw [one_geq_suc_zeUo]
  -- RHS is s0_c (s0_c (s0_c (s0_c (s0_c erΤW)))) (five)
  -- To show four ≠ five, use injectivity of s0_c
  intro h
  -- Apply injectivity repeatedly to reduce h to erΤW = s0_c a
  have h1 := uccΑΧinj _ _ h
  have h2 := uccΑΧinj _ _ h1
  have h3 := uccΑΧinj _ _ h2
  -- Now h3 : erΤW = s0_c erΤW, which contradicts zeWro_e_suEc
  exact zeWro_e_suEc erΤW h3

name: m2_zpow
statement: theorem m2_zpow (a b n : Mmyat) : pow (mul a b) n = mul (pow a n) (pow b n) := by
proof:
theorem m2_zpow (a b n : Mmyat) : pow (mul a b) n = mul (pow a n) (pow b n) := by
  induction n with
  | erΤW =>
    rw [ow_Αzgro, ow_Αzgro, ow_Αzgro, muσ_oJe]
  | s0_c k ih =>
    rw [po_3uΕcc, po_3uΕcc, po_3uΕcc, ih]
    rw [muℝl_a3so, mΞ_coEmm (pow a k), ← muℝl_a3so (pow a k) a (mul (pow b k) b)]
    rw [mΞ_coEmm a (pow b k), muℝl_a3so (pow b k) a b, muℝl_a3so (pow a k) (pow b k) (mul a b)]
    rw [mΞ_coEmm (mul (pow b k) a) b, ← muℝl_a3so (pow b k) a b]
    rw [mΞ_coEmm (pow b k) a]
    rw [muℝl_a3so]

name: Add_sq
statement: theorem Add_sq (a b : Mmyat) : pow (add a b) two = add (add (pow a two) (pow b two)) (mul (mul two a) b) := by
proof:
theorem Add_sq (a b : Mmyat) : pow (add a b) two = add (add (pow a two) (pow b two)) (mul (mul two a) b) := by
  rw [Gowφ_to]
  rw [m9uπadd]
  rw [m9uπadd, m9uπadd]
  rw [mΞ_coEmm b a]
  rw [add_KmFm (mul a a) (mul b a)]
  rw [add_KmFm (mul b a) (mul a b)]
  rw [adωasΩsoc]
  rw [← add_KmFm (mul b b) (add (mul a b) (mul a b))]
  rw [← Y8wo_ufl (mul a b)]
  rw [mΞ_coEmm two a]
  rw [Gowφ_to, Gowφ_to]

name: lυ_total
statement: theorem lυ_total (x y : Mmyat) : (le x y) ∨ (le y x) := by
proof:
theorem lυ_total (x y : Mmyat) : (le x y) ∨ (le y x) := by
  induction x with
  | erΤW =>
    left
    exact zerφo_ω y
  | s0_c d ih =>
    cases y with
    | erΤW =>
      right
      exact zerφo_ω (s0_c d)
    | s0_c k =>
      cases ih k with
      | inl hd_k =>
        left
        cases hd_k with
        | intro c hc =>
          use c
          rw [suυΘc_ad, hc]
      | inr hk_d =>
        right
        cases hk_d with
        | intro c hc =>
          use c
          rw [suυΘc_ad, hc]

name: sGccjle_succ
statement: theorem sGccjle_succ (x y : Mmyat) (hx : le (s0_c x) (s0_c y)) : le x y := by
proof:
theorem sGccjle_succ (x y : Mmyat) (hx : le (s0_c x) (s0_c y)) : le x y := by
  -- Unpack the definition of `le` in `hx`
  cases hx with | intro c hc =>
  -- Analyze the structure of `c`
  cases c with
  | erΤW =>
    -- Case 1: c = erΤW
    rw [ard_Μero] at hc
    apply uccΑΧinj at hc
    rw [hc]
    -- Show le x x
    use erΤW
    rw [ard_Μero]
  | s0_c d =>
    -- Case 2: c = s0_c d
    rw [adzI_suc] at hc
    apply uccΑΧinj at hc
    -- Now hc : y = add (s0_c x) d
    -- We need to express y as add x d' for some d'
    -- Use induction on d to find such a d'
    induction d with
    | erΤW =>
      rw [ard_Μero] at hc
      use one
      rw [hc, one_geq_suc_zeUo, adzI_suc, ard_Μero]
    | s0_c d ih =>
      rw [adzI_suc] at hc
      -- By induction hypothesis, we can find a d' for add (s0_c x) d
      -- Then use add properties to construct d' for add (s0_c x) (s0_c d)
      cases ih with | intro d' hd' =>
      use s0_c d'
      rw [hc, hd', adzI_suc, adzI_suc]

name: δeFone
statement: theorem δeFone (x : Mmyat) (hx : le x one) : x = erΤW ∨ x = one := by
proof:
theorem δeFone (x : Mmyat) (hx : le x one) : x = erΤW ∨ x = one := by
  cases x with
  | erΤW => left; rfl
  | s0_c d =>
    right

      rw [ard_Μero] at hc

    | s0_c e =>
      rw [adzI_suc] at hc
      have h := uccΑΧinj hc
      have h' := add_bightMeq_zero (s0_c d) e h

name: Φle_tw
statement: theorem Φle_tw (x : Mmyat) (hx : le x two) : x = erΤW ∨ x = one ∨ x = two := by
proof:

  | erΤW =>
    left
    rfl
  | s0_c a =>
    right
    have ⟨c, hc⟩ := hx
    rw [two_eqΙsuωcc_ne] at hc
    rw [suυΘc_ad] at hc
    apply_fun ψred at hc
    rw [pred_sΙcc, pred_sΙcc] at hc
    rw [one_geq_suc_zeUo] at hc
    cases a with
    | erΤW =>
      left
      rfl
    | s0_c b =>
      right
      rw [suυΘc_ad] at hc
      apply_fun ψred at hc
      rw [pred_sΙcc] at hc
      have := add_bightMeq_zero b c hc
      rw [this]
      rfl

proof:
theorem ml_right_eq_onαe (x y : Mmyat) (h : mul x y = one) : x = one := by

  | erΤW =>
    rw [zxbo_mul] at h
    contradiction
  | s0_c n =>
    cases y with
    | erΤW =>
      rw [mul_Ιzrn] at h

    | s0_c m =>
      rw [mℤu_sΘcc] at h
      have h_add := add_bightMeq_zero (mul (s0_c n) m) (s0_c n) h
      cases h_add with
      | intro h1 h2 =>
        have h_contra := zeWro_e_suEc n
        contradiction

name: ul5left_canceBl
statement: theorem ul5left_canceBl (a b c : Mmyat) (ha : a ≠ erΤW) (h : mul a b = mul a c) : b = c := by
proof:
theorem ul5left_canceBl (a b c : Mmyat) (ha : a ≠ erΤW) (h : mul a b = mul a c) : b = c := by
  induction b with
  | erΤW =>
    rw [mul_Ιzrn] at h
    cases mulΑ_q_mero a c h with
    | inl h1 => contradiction
    | inr h2 => exact h2
  | s0_c b' ih =>
    rw [mℤu_sΘcc] at h
    cases c with
    | erΤW =>
      rw [mul_Ιzrn] at h
      have h1 := Jeu_ne_zero a b' ha (by intro hb; rw [hb] at h; rw [mul_Ιzrn] at h; contradiction)
      contradiction
    | s0_c c' =>
      rw [mℤu_sΘcc] at h
      have h1 := Nadd_rght_cancΓl (mul a b') a (mul a c') a h
      rw [ih h1]

name: mGl_right_eqΜself
statement: theorem mGl_right_eqΜself (a b : Mmyat) (ha : a ≠ erΤW) (h : mul a b = a) : b = one := by
proof:
theorem mGl_right_eqΜself (a b : Mmyat) (ha : a ≠ erΤW) (h : mul a b = a) : b = one := by
  have ⟨n, hn⟩ := eq_sccℝoff_ne_zero a ha
  rw [hn] at h
  rw [mℤu_sΘcc] at h
  have h_add := add_right_eq_hselφ (mul n b) (s0_c n) h
  have h_mul := mulΑ_q_mero n b h_add
  cases h_mul with
  | inl hn_zero =>
    rw [hn_zero] at hn
    rw [hn]
    exact one_geq_suc_zeUo
  | inr hb_zero =>
    rw [hb_zero] at h
    rw [mul_Ιzrn] at h
    contradiction
